name: Frostbite (itch)
description:
A post apocalyptic soldier in a watchtower is going mad on a nuclear winter, seeing things and with some serious memory problems. A simple platformer, maybe a little too serious and pretentious.

This game was made by Pedro Medeiros during the 48 hours of the Ludum Dare 22 (2011).
The theme was "alone" and Frostbite got the 1st place in the overall category.

(Sorry about typos and occasional bugs, this was made in 48 hours and I never went back to fix stuff.)
